root.cn: 这是平板上一款帮助孩子快速学习形状和颜色的应用! 包含十几种常见的形状：三角形, 正方形, 长方形, 菱形, 梯形, 圆, 椭圆, 半圆, 五边形, 五角星, 心形等；十几种颜色: 红色, 蓝色, 黄色, 绿色, 橙色, 橙色, 粉色, 紫色, 灰色, 棕色, 黑色, 白色等。让孩子在有趣和直观的拖动物体过程中快速记住和分辨出这些形状和颜色。 游戏包括三种模式：形状，颜色，形状和颜色组合模式，每个模式包含有50多个关卡。
root.en: This is an application on the Pad to help children learn the shape and color quickly. Contains a dozen common shapes: triangular, square, rectangular, trapezoidal, rhombic, round, oval, round, heart-shaped Pentagon, pentagram, etc.; a dozen colors: red, blue, yellow, green, orange, orange, pink, purple, grey, brown, black, white, etc.. Let the child remember and distinguish the shapes and colors quickly in the fun and intuitive drag objects. The game consists of three modes: shape, color, shape, and color combination mode, each of which contains more than 50 levels.
